DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 13 Cancer Doctors Advise Quit Smoking Cigarettes Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not their cancer doctors have advised them to quit smoking cigarettes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Cancer Doctor Advised to Quit Smoking Cigarettes
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about whether an individual's cancer doctor has advised them to quit smoking cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable; I have not smoked cigarettes since my diagnosis.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis

A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have your cancer doctors advi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have your cancer doctors advised you to quit smoking cigarettes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
